title: enniDam En
sahitya:
enniDam En innum irakkam uravillaiyO cenni malai tannilurai SaNmukha semmalE


anupallavi

  unnaDiyE sharaNam enruraittavuDanE paNNiya bhAvam tiNNamAi tolaiyumE


caraNam    kaN kalangak-kUDum kaNNIraik-koTTi viNNaiyeTTi muTTa vimmiyazha vENumO
taNNoLi vIsumun kaNNonrAl ennai puNNiya mUrti nI pArttaruLa vENumE
